headline: A Look At LyondellBasell (LYB) Valuation After Capacity Cuts And Better Than Expected Results
summary: LyondellBasell Industries (LYB) is back in focus after its third quarter 2025 results exceeded expectations, with management outlining multi year ethylene capacity closures and idling aimed at rebalancing supply and supporting sector pricing. See our latest analysis for LyondellBasell Industries. LyondellBasell’s 1 day share price return of 2.26% and 30 day share price return of 22.69%, lifting the stock to US$55.10, sit against a weaker 1 year total shareholder return of 20.99% decline. This...
